_header: Sith it concluded was in the Trinity
_description: A song of the Redemption — four 8-line stanzas (aaabbccd) with refrain, ‘Now blessid lady wepe no more / Affaide’ and burden: ‘Affraid alas and whi so sodenli / Whi so dismaid / Whi shuld she hevy be / Or otherwise evyll apaide’

BLAdd5465.First Lines:
Sith it concludid was in the triniteThat the son of god shulde make
                    us fre…
BLAdd5465.Last Lines:
…His deth was swete hit did us goodeHe bought us with his
                    precious blodeTherefore though deth be nevir so soreNow blessid lady
                    wepe no more
BLAdd5465.Editions:
Fehr,  Bernhard. 
             “Die Lieder des Fairfax MS (Add. 5465 Brit. Mus.).” 
             Archiv für das Studium der neueren Sprachen und
                Literaturen
         106 (1901): 48-70: 61-2.
Stevens,  John,
                        ed.  
             Music and Poetry in the Early Tudor Court.
         London: Methuen, 1961: 368-9.
